Class Iceepeecee

java.lang.Object
Iceepeecee
public class Iceepeecee extends Object
The simulator of the island group of Iceepeecee. It has islands and planes with cameras that fly over the islands taking photographs.
Version:
(1.0)
Author:
(Juliana Brice√±o & Cristian Alvarez)

    • photograph

      public void photograph(int theta)
      Takes photographs with a specified angle (theta) for all flights in Iceepeecee.
      Parameters:
      theta - The angle (in degrees) at which the photographs will be taken.

    • photograph

      public void photograph(double theta)
      Takes photographs with a specified angle (theta) for all flights in Iceepeecee.
      Parameters:
      theta - The angle (in degrees) at which the photographs will be taken.

    • photograph

      public void photograph(String flight, int theta)
      Takes a photograph with a specified angle (theta) for a specific flight in Iceepeecee.
      Parameters:
      flight - The identifier of the flight for which the photograph will be taken.
      theta - The angle (in degrees) at which the photograph will be taken.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified flight does not exist.

    • flightCamera

      public int flightCamera(String color)
      Retrieves the angle (theta) of the camera for a specific flight in Iceepeecee.
      Parameters:
      color - The identifier of the flight for which the camera angle is requested.
      Returns:
      The angle (in degrees) of the camera for the specified flight.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified flight doesn't exist or if it doesn't have a photograph.

      Consult the existing flights.

    • observedIslands

      public String[] observedIslands()
      Retrieves the colors of islands observed by flights in Iceepeecee based on the flight photographs.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the colors of observed islands.

    • uselessFlights

      public String[] uselessFlights()
      Retrieves the colors of flights that have taken photographs without capturing any observed islands.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the colors of useless flights.

    • ok

      public boolean ok()
      Checks the operational status of the Iceepeecee simulator.
      Returns:
      True if the simulator is in an operational state, false otherwise.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks the visibility status of the Iceepeecee simulation.
      Returns:
      True if the simulation is currently visible, false otherwise.

    • finish

      public void finish()
      Finish the simulator.
